name: Responsive-flickr-gallery
tagline: Responsive galleries from your Flickr photos for your WordPress enabled website.
body: [Responsive Flickr Gallery on WordPress.org](http://wordpress.org/plugins/responsive-flickr-gallery/) ### Support this plugin It takes time and effort to keep releasing new versions of this plugin. If you like it, consider donating a few bucks (especially if you are using this plugin on a commercial website) to keep receiving new features. Thanks for your support!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
